title: Invesco, Carmignac Bet Against US Debt, See Limited Fed Cuts
description: The bond market’s consensus view that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates at least twice more this year is at odds with US economic resilience, say portfolio managers at Invesco Ltd. and Carmignac, who are betting against Treasuries.
content: The bond market’s consensus view that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates at least twice more this year is at odds with US economic resilience, say portfolio managers at Invesco Ltd. and Carmignac, who are betting against Treasuries.
